accounts.name: payer
accounts.desc: The account paying for the token account creation if needed

accounts.name: token
accounts.desc: The token account that may or may not exist

accounts.name: mint
accounts.desc: The mint account of the provided token account

accounts.name: owner
accounts.desc: The owner of the provided token account

accounts.name: ata
accounts.desc: The associated token account which may be the same as the token account

errors.name: InvalidAssociatedTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Associated Token Account: it should derive from the provided mint and owner

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Invalid Token Mint: it should be the same as the provided mint account

errors.name: InvalidTokenOwner
errors.msg: Invalid Program Owner: it should be the same as the provided owner account

errors.name: CannotCreateNonAssociatedToken
errors.msg: Cannot create non-associated token accounts as they would need to sign the transaction. Please provide an associated token account instead
